Does anybody have any clues as to why the smart content options would not be appearing for a module? It's within a global partial, it's a custom module that we use frequently (the website header from the Growth theme) and smart content usually displays... but not on this one site. Scratching my head as to why!
For reference, the module itself wasn't set as global in the meta.json
